body.p: In 2009 the Board was asked by the IFRIC to consider a similar issue. This issue was whether a right entitling the holder to receive a fixed number of the issuing entity’s own equity instruments for a fixed amount of a currency other than the issuing entity’s functional currency (foreign currency) should be accounted for as a derivative liability.
